thread.title: Shooting of teen outside Cleveland school gang-related, police reports say
thread.title_full: Shooting of teen outside Cleveland school gang-related, police reports say

author: Adam Ferrise, cleveland.com
title: Shooting of teen outside Cleveland school gang-related, police reports say
text: The shooting of a 13-year-old boy outside a Cleveland school is being investigated as gang-related, according to police reports.
